changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks
changeSet.sql: update report.course_item_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where course_item_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )
update report.call_duration_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where call_duration_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )
update report.sms_sent_measure set location_id = ( select location_id from report.registration_measure where sms_sent_measure.flw_id = registration_measure.flw_id )

changeSet.author: ThoughtWorks
changeSet.sql: update report.front_line_worker_dimension set status='UNREGISTERED' where id > 20988
